column3: 怪しい商人見なかった？

砂嵐の中に隠された古代人が残したお宝…

ロマンがあるよナァ…

ロマンしかないよナァ…

でも あの砂嵐
一日に数時間だけ止むって聞いたんだけど
全然止まないんだよナァ…

寝てるとき以外
ずっと見てるのにナァ…
column4:
A treasure hidden inside a sandstorm by
an ancient civilization...
The makings of a fine adventure for sure.
They say the sandstorm lets up for a few
hours each day, but I haven't seen it
settle down for even an instant.
I've had my eyes glued to it all this time.
Except for when I've fallen asleep...

column3:
明日こそは砂嵐が晴れたとこを見るんダァ…
ムニャムニャ…
column4:
Tomorrow will be the day I see this sandstorm swirl
to a halt... I just know it!

column3:
怪しい商人？
残念だけど知らないナァ
ボクが興味あるのは
あの砂嵐とお宝だけだからナァ…
column4:
Shifty merchants? Sorry, no idea
what you're talking about.

The only things I'm interested in right
now are this sandstorm and the treasure
hiding inside its...storming...sands...

column3:
砂嵐の中に隠された古代人が残したお宝…

ロマンがあるよナァ…

ロマンしかないよナァ…

でも あの砂嵐
一日に数時間だけ止むって聞いたんだけど
全然止まないんだよナァ…
column4:
A treasure hidden inside a sandstorm by
an ancient civilization...

Sounds like an adventure just waiting
to happen.

They say the sandstorm lets up for a few
hours each day, but I haven't seen it
settle down for even an instant.

column3:
寝てるとき以外
ずっと見てるのにナァ…
column4:
I haven't taken my eyes off this
sandstorm for days. Except for when
I've fallen asleep...

column3:
それで… キミ…
誰だっけ？
column4:
And that brings me to my next point!
...Who are you?

column3:
ってか…何度も言うけど…
キミ誰よ？
column4:
OK, OK, I know I keep asking you this,
but... Who are you?
Wait, who did you say you are again?

column3:
まぁ これは男のロマンなんだ
女の子にはわからないだろうけどね
column4:
An adventure like this has been a lifelong
dream! You could never understand!

column3:
気が散るから
邪魔しないでくれるかな

…ん？アレ？？
もしかして砂嵐止んでる？！
ずっと見てたのにナァ…
なんで消えたんだろうナァ…ロマンだナァ…
column4:
Huh? Did it...
Did the sandstorm stop?!

After all this time watching it...
Why did it just disappear like that?
What a mystery!

column3:
あの砂嵐…一日に数時間だけ
消える時があるらしいんだけどサァ…
全然消えないんだよナァ…
column4:
That sandstorm... They say it stops for
a few hours a day, but it hasn't let up
even a little since I've been watching.

column3:
明日こそは砂嵐が晴れたとこを見るんダァ…
ムニャムニャ…
column4:
Tomorrow will be the day I see this sandstorm swirl
to a halt... I just know it!

column3:
あの砂嵐の奥に
古代人が残したお宝があるっていうからサァ…
砂嵐が止まったら探しにいこうと思って
ずっと見てるんだけどサァ…
もしかして ガセネタなのかナァ…
column4:
Rumor has it an ancient civilization hid a
treasure inside that sandstorm.

I've been here for days waiting for the
storm to settle down so I can nab it!
I just hope it wasn't a bad lead...
